movie.title: At Eternity's Gate
movie.plot: Famed but tormented artist Vincent van Gogh spends his final years in Arles, France, painting masterworks of the natural world that surrounds him.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 15 nominations.

events.title: Vincent van Gogh dies of an infection caused by a bullet wound
